# Markdown basics

# This is a heading
## Heading for a smaller font
### etc

ctrl+shift+k  - compiles the markdown and shows the final version

# Formatting

this is plain text
for a new maragraph add 2 spaced at the end of the line  
like this  
Bold: **with asterics'**  
Italics: *one asterics*  
Strike through: ~~like this~~  
Bullet points:  
* One  
  * Two  
bluh ---  


Inline equation:  
$3*23/124$

[Link:](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/model-building.html)  


Adding code:
```{r random_name, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(babynames)
library(stargazer)
# Ctrl+Enter runs the line
# Ctrl+Shift+Enter runs the whole code chunk



```

```{r}
babynames
```

```{r}
bertha<-
  babynames %>% 
  filter(name=="Bertha")
bertha
```

```{r}
bertha %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=year, y=prop,group=sex, color=sex )+
  geom_line()


```


Linear regression  
```{r}
bert_mod<- lm(prop ~ year * sex, data=bertha)
tidy(bert_mod)
glance(bert_mod)



```

```{r, results='asis'}

stargazer(bert_mod, type="html", title="model summary")
```
